sentence.Network_en: I would no longer uncomplainingly accept their barbs or allow their unaccountable power to go unchallenged.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不会再毫无怨言地洗耳恭听他们带刺的话,或让他们的不负责任的权力不受到挑战.

sentence.Network_en: The moth having righted himself now lay most decently and uncomplainingly composed.
sentence.Network_cn: 死去的蛾现在是安详高贵的并且毫无抱怨的沉睡了.

sentence.Network_en: Under bitter hardship, they have struggled on tirelessly and uncomplainingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不知疲倦毫无怨言地在极端艰苦的条件下努力工作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 专八翻译笔记 – 【人人分享-人人网】 ... 在人群中穿行 weave one's way through 任劳任怨 uncomplainingly.
The&nbsp;Joy&nbsp;of&nbsp;Living... ... 6. conquer vt. 攻克 8. uncomplainingly adv. 不诉苦地 9. frivolous adj. 轻佻的.

she did her share of the work uncomplainingly but she was always ailing . old Dr. Fontaine diagnosed her trouble as female complaint and concurred with Dr. Meade in saying she should never have had Beau .她毫无怨言地做着自己份内的工作，可是常常生玻老方丹大夫诊断她有妇女病，并且提出了与米德大夫相一致的看法

sentences.sentence: "an equally gallant little wife and mother uncomplainingly keeping up the production of tasty and nourishing meals"

auth_sentence.content: Then he uncomplainingly cut spending by three billion dollars.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then he uncomplainingly cut spending by three billion dollars.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then he uncomplainingly cut spending by three billion dollars.
